basics.name: Aryaman Paliwal
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: Hi there! I'm Aryaman, a final year student pursuing a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science and Engineering from IIIT Kota. I am currently seeking a Software Development Engineer (SDE) internship opportunity to further enhance my skills and gain practical experience in the field. I'm a Programmer, Web Developer, I have acquired a strong foundation in computer science principles and programming languages such as C/C++, Python etc throughout my academic journey. I'm zealous towards technology and open to work with programming facts.

work.summary: Provided precise and enlightening resolutions for intricate programming dilemmas, encompassing data structures, algorithms, and various computer science principles. Demonstrated consistent proficiency in furnishing coherent and methodical solutions to multifaceted coding predicaments, facilitating students' grasp of intricate concepts and elevating their aptitude in creative problem-solving.

education.institution: Indian Institute of Information Technology, Kota

publications.title: Heart Stroke Prediction - Quantum Machine Learning
publications.details: ▸This is a research Based project. Come up with an improved algorithm and Promising results. ▸Achieved an accuracy of 98.71%. ▸Tech: Python, Classical & Quantum Machine Learning, Qiskit, IBM Quantum Composer.

publications.title: VoiceFeed
publications.details: ▸VoiceFeed is a web based application which can fetch news from different sources and categories. ▸Adding to that it can also fetch weather by users voice command. ▸Tech: React, AlanAI, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Node, Express
